settings.title: Crownstone configuration
settings.subtitle: Crownstone needs to know which BLE devices are Crownstones. For the initial setup process it will query the Crownstone servers for this. Your Crownstone email address and password will be stored on the Homey.
settings.valid_credentials: You are now logged in to Crownstone!
settings.invalid_credentials: These credentials are invalid. Please check your e-mail address or password.
